Uses of Interface
com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients.SerializationAdapter

  • Packages that use SerializationAdapter 
    Package Description
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Client.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients
    This is the core package for Communication.

    • Uses of SerializationAdapter in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client

      Methods in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client with parameters of type SerializationAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClientStart.addFallBackSerialization(SerializationAdapter<Object,String> serializationAdapter)
      Adds a SerializationAdapter as a fallback serialization instance to this ClientStart.
      void ClientStart.setMainSerializationAdapter(SerializationAdapter<Object,String> mainSerializationAdapter)
      Sets the SerializationAdapter as the main serialization instance to this ClientStart.

    • Uses of SerializationAdapter in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients

      Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients that implement SerializationAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JavaSerializationAdapter
      This SerializationAdapter utilizes the Java-Serialization, to serialize a Object into a String.
      class  PingSerializationAdapter
      This DeSerializationAdapter will deserialize an Ping, serialized with the PingSerializationAdapter
      Methods in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients that return SerializationAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SerializationAdapter<Object,String> SerializationAdapter.getDefaultJavaDeSerialization()
      Creates the default SerializationAdapter, utilizing the Java-Serialization.
      SerializationAdapter<Object,String> Client.getMainSerializationAdapter() 
      Methods in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients that return types with arguments of type SerializationAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<SerializationAdapter<Object,String>> SerializationAdapter.getDefaultFallback()
      Creates the default SerializationAdapters, utilizing the Java-Serialization, which will be used, once the main-serialization fails.
      Set<SerializationAdapter<Object,String>> Client.getFallBackSerialization() 
      Methods in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients with parameters of type SerializationAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Client.addFallBackSerialization(SerializationAdapter<Object,String> serializationAdapter)
      Adds an FallbackSerialization in form of an SerializationAdapter.
      void Client.setMainSerializationAdapter(SerializationAdapter<Object,String> mainSerializationAdapter)
      Sets the Main-SerializationAdapter to be used by the Connection, encapsulated by this Client.
      Method parameters in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients with type arguments of type SerializationAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Client.addFallBackSerializationAdapter(List<SerializationAdapter<Object,String>> fallBackSerializationAdapter)
      This method sets the internal List of FallBackSerializationAdapter, without overriding the existing ones.
